privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.p1: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our DoHero application.
privacy.section1Text: We collect the information you provide directly to us when you create an account, which includes your name and email address.
privacy.section2Text: We use the collected information to create and manage your account, provide and maintain our application, and improve your experience.
privacy.section3Text: We use security measures to protect your personal information. However, no security system is impenetrable.
privacy.section4Text: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time by contacting us.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.p1: Welcome to DoHero! By using our application, you agree to these terms.
terms.section1Text: DoHero is a tool to help you build and track habits in a gamified way. You agree to use the application only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms.
terms.section2Text: To use DoHero, you need to create an account by providing an email and password. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for all activities that occur under it.
terms.section3Text: The application and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of DoHero and its licensors.
terms.section4Text: In no event shall DoHero be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.
terms.section5Text: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms in the application.
